title: How do I delete my old item sets in the new patch?
body: So obviously we can not access our item sets in the new interface, but if i have outdated item sets is there a way to delete them or are they just going to be there FOR - EV - ER.........?

replies.body: You would need to launch the legacy client, remove the item sets from the interface, load a custom game for the item sets data to update.
How do we load the legacy client if we installed the beta client?

> [{quoted}](name=Nebuul,realm=NA,application-id=2E4zVIwd,discussion-id=EdVsWY9Z,comment-id=00000000,timestamp=2017-01-10T00:37:10.721+0000)
>
> How do we load the legacy client if we installed the beta client?

Are you joking? sigh !!!
{{sticker:zombie-brand-facepalm}} 

read/search before asking question 

{{sticker:slayer-jinx-unamused}} 

here : http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/alpha-client-discussion/irEothGt-workaround-for-launching-the-legacy-client

I appreciate the link.  The reason for my question is this:  If you go to a help forum, and you ask a question, and the answer requires a separate procedure to implement, it is good to have a link to that procedure in the response.
